card_text: Activate 1 of these effects, also, after that, Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY.$N●Send 1 monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY, and if you do, add 1 Flip monster from your Deck to your hand with the same Attribute, but a different name, as that monster before it was sent to the GY.$N●Send 1 Flip monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY, and if you do, add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand with the same Attribute but a lower original Level, as that monster before it was sent to the GY.$NYou can only activate 1 "Subterror Succession" per turn.
